sourcesContent:
<template src="./InvestStocks.html"></template>
<style scoped src="./InvestStocks.css"></style>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: 'InvestStocks',
  data() {
    return {
      products: [],
      selectedCompanies: []
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    axios
        .get('http://localhost:8081/api/v1/products')
        .then(response => {
          this.products = response.data.content;
          this.products.forEach(item => {
            item.stocks = item.productCode + "\n" + item.productName
          })
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.log(error)
        })
  },
  computed: {

  },
  methods: {
    isAddedProduct(product) {
      if (this.selectedCompanies.length > 0) {
        let selectedProduct = this.selectedCompanies.find(p => p.productId === product.productId);
        return !!selectedProduct;
      }
      return false;
    },
    addItem(product) {
      this.selectedCompanies.push({
        userId: 1,
        productId: product.productId,
        productCode: product.productCode,
        unitPrice: product.unitPrice
      })
      console.log(this.selectedCompanies);
    }
  }
}
</script>
